title: Academic Literacy and Ethos: Communicating Diversity for a Just Society
description: Teaches foundational concepts for intellectual exploration and personal development within an academic community: analysis, critical thinking, metacognition, engagement with others across difference, and self-efficacy. The Oakes core course considers the intersections between reading, personal and social identities, and social justice.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to first-year college members.
